title: Review Map Add-ons v.3 (Mobs Update)
briefDescription: Do you have a YouTube channel and want to show Add-ons? Well this map is for you! Since thanks to this map you can make ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you have a YouTube channel and want to show Add-ons? Well this map is for you! Since thanks to this map you can make quite complete Reviews and without the need to fill your list of worlds
This map is quite basic, it is only so that people who have a YouTube channel and want to upload Add-ons do not have to create a world every time they make a review
Map Image:
?El mapa actualizado e implementado m?s cosas para que sus comentarios sean mucho m?s completo
It also includes two constructions of crafting tables and ovens where you can show some functions that the add-on that you want to show brings.

Now the map contains some command blocks that will help you doing certain functions!
Time Set:
Weather:
Gamemode:
Difficulty:
And two command blocks have also been implemented which will take you to the Nether and the End!
In this new update includes a new teleporter to a new area where many of the mobs are and so you can show new drops or mechanics that add the add-on you want to show:

title: MS Castr?ma
briefDescription: This small cruise ship, the MS Castr?ma, is a beautiful cruise, with 5 decks and 55 rooms. It includes terraces and even Jacuzzis. It has a ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This small cruise ship, the MS Castr?ma, is a beautiful cruise, with 5 decks and 55 rooms. It includes terraces and even Jacuzzis. It has a casino, coffee, pools, spa, even a little hospital. You will enjoy it ?
The MS Castr?ma has a length of 141 blocks, a wide of 42 blocks and an approximately 48 blocks of height. It also has a capacity of 162 passengers, 10 lifeboats and a lot of public areas. Even if it?s a small cruise it took me around 5 months to finish it (I?m student so i didn?t have so much time), I even created a fake cruise line named BCM Cruises International. I put a lot of effort in this project so I wish you?ll enjoy it as much as I did creating it. As I said before the ship has a lot of features from the engine room to the pool area, I tried to put a lot of attention to details. I hope you will like it and recommend it, thank you.
YouTube video:
https://youtu.be/Z8PQZTqWsts
Images below:

title: 5?5 Parkour (NEW FEATURES)
briefDescription: What happens when you only have a 5x5 area of space? You go up! 5x5 Parkour has little segments of parkour for you to finish! ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
What happens when you only have a 5?5 area of space? You go up! 5?5 Parkour has little segments of parkour for you to finish! The higher you go, the harder it gets, but there are checkpoints that makes the parkour a little less frustrating.
In 5?5 parkour, there are coloured segments for you to pass, with each segment you pass, it gets harder and harder. There are a total of 9 segments. The segments get high so watch your step to not fall down!
NEW ADDED FEATURES:
? The ?Un-Alive? Machine 9000.
? Togglable Features
Togglable Features include Friendly Fire/PvP, Fall Damage, and Invisibility.
Friendly Fire/PvP is pretty self-explanatory along with all the other features. It toggles the ability to hit others. This can be used to do sabatoge others in a competition!
Fall Damage toggles the ability to be damaged or hurt when falling. This can be used to have a quick way of respawning from a high height instead of using The ?Un-Alive? Machine 9000.
Invisibility toggles the ability to be turned invisible. This is used when there are too many people to see the parkour. You will still be see others because everyone will be equiped with leather boots.
Here are some additional pictures here to see what the parkour looks like:

title: TSA ?Top Secret Authority?
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted a top-secret authority to share with your friends, then you have come to the right place. In the future, there will ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wanted a top-secret authority to share with your friends, then you have come to the right place. In the future, there will be multiple bases, connected by secret underground tunnels,
which also lead to the wild. Currently, there is a boat attached to a dock, but I was so excited, so I wanted to get it out there! I am sorry for the short introduction, it will be longer in the future, this is my first map. I hope you like my map! ?
I guess all secret organizations need air transport, so the first kind of air transport I added was a helicopter. Here is an image.

This is the interior, it has glowstone lights, purpur stairs, which represent chairs,
and finally, a lever at the front. The lever does not do anything but it looks good.

title: (JOLLY) Jolly?s Fantasy World (Beta) [Creation]
briefDescription: If you're looking for a Minecraft version of JOLLY, then you found the right map. Explore Jolly's Fantasy World to find your friends, Jolly, Tweetie, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
If you?re looking for a Minecraft version of JOLLY, then you found the right map. Explore Jolly?s Fantasy World to find your friends, Jolly, Tweetie, George, and Maxie. Have some fun at Jolly?s.
This map is a RECREATION of JOLLY and it is a creation map. I remade all rooms of Jolly?s, made differences to the original game, and added more details. I made the exterior of Jolly?s different to the game because the Minecraft version of JOLLY is non-canon and it is inspired by McDonalds and Jollibee.

DISCLAIMER: I do not own the game nor the characters. Jolly 1 is owned by IvanG and the original Five Nights at Freddy?s franchise is owned by Scott Cawthon. This map is not an official Jollibee map.
WARNING: DO NOT REUPLOAD THIS MAP TO OTHER WEBSITES. If you want to make a video about this map, credit me and put the MCPEDL link in the description, as long as you don?t steal this map.
This map contains:
Enter Jolly?s and pick a table to eat.
Go the Jolly?s stage to see Jolly and Tweetie sing and dance. Enjoy their show.
Pick a room to party and celebrate someone?s birthday like your relative, close friend, etc.
If you?re the night guard you must check all rooms if there is an intruder!

title: The Legend of the Fallen Hero
briefDescription: A kingdom tormented by an evil dragon, the only way to save the kingdom is to recover the bow of the fallen hero and wipe ...

crawledImageUrls.text: A kingdom tormented by an evil dragon, the only way to save the kingdom is to recover the bow of the fallen hero and wipe out that dragon once and for all, and you are the unique person who can do this!

The Trone Room ?^
It was a quiet kingdom until the arrival of a dragon who began to scare and trouble the king and the inhabitants of the kingdom, because of this, a hero emerged to try to fight the dragon. Did it work? Did he save the kingdom? no one ever knew, only who wrote the book. The book is located in the castle.
Read the book follow the instructions and save the kingdom! Or if you want, just walk into the castle and explore him for complete!

title: Loop City ? A Massive Minecraft City
briefDescription: Loop City is a Minecraft map I created which has a train system, massive metro system (so big I had to create a subway map), ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Loop City is a Minecraft map I created which has a train system, massive metro system (so big I had to create a subway map), hundreds of roads, and just lots of places for you to explore!
There are also big malls and there?s even a rugby stadium with backstage entry to reporter grounds.
This city is far from being finished however, so please tell me any improvements you think I should make!

title: M4ster Chief380?s Mini Manson
briefDescription: This is a map made for my friend it has some mods in it that i didn't make or own we just used them ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a map made for my friend it has some mods in it that i didn?t make or own we just used them to decorate. We have a complete interior but we didn?t spend to much time on it so feel free to decorate it and change anything i hope you enjoy.
The mansion comes fully furnished with three floors an attic as well as a basement.The first floor has a kitchen and living room where as the second floor has one bedroom a master bedroom and two bathrooms it also has balcony?s that lead to the third floor.On the third floor there is a game room and an office as well as a chill out room.
Outside the mansion has a pool with a Jacuzzi and a bar it also has a tennis court a car park a farm and a garage for your vehicles.

title: The World Of Games (Theme Park)
briefDescription: The World of Games is an enormous Minecraft Theme Park with rides and attractions of some of our favorite games. Without a doubt you will ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The World of Games is an enormous Minecraft Theme Park with rides and attractions of some of our favorite games. Without a doubt you will have an amazing time here in this park!
The Park is made by EmileCar and ThomasDM (from the creator of the DisneyPark Map)
Your journey begins once you enter the Entrance Building and go through the town of Flarelyn. At the end of the Main Street, you canFrom there on you can visit all the rides in each different section of the park:
Aperture Science Factory: ? Portal minigame puzzles ? A Portal Ride
Nintendoland: ? Wii Sports Tennis Court ? Super Mario Coaster ? Splatoon ? Mario Kart ? Excitebike Coaster ? Luigi?s Haunted Mansion ? Donkey Kong Wooden Jungle Coaster ? Underwater Coaster (North)
The Legend Of Zelda Castle: ? Zelda: The Ride ? Castle Firework Show
Waterland: ? Waterland Coaster ? Sea Of Thieves Kinder Coaster ? Underwater Coaster (South)
Valentine Town: ? Red Dead Redemption Valentine Town ? Red Dead Redemption Wooden Coaster
Rocket League ? Rocket League Arena (Rocket League Ride Coming Soon!)
But those are not the only things in the park. There are other buildings, easter eggs, decorations literally everywhere. Each Ride/Minigame is completely functional and mostly automatic. A lot of rides also have their own background music.
New updates will come soon! If you want us to add your favorite game, let us know! You can reach out to us on Twitter and Youtube
Map Trailer:

title: Happy Pride 2020!
briefDescription: It's June and it's time to celebrate pride month! This world is a small celebration map that I just made in about a week to ...

crawledImageUrls.text: It?s June and it?s time to celebrate pride month! This world is a small celebration map that I just made in about a week to celebrate this yearly event to the LGBTQ+ community.

Note: You will need to play on the 1.16.0.64 beta. (I am unsure if this will work on previous versions of the 1.16 beta.)
The map contains the following:
The Pride Flags*

*There might be flags which are different versions of the same flag, flags vary by source, so I chose a random flag per orientation. There also might be missing flags as I cannot assure that the source has listed all of the pride flags in their article.
The Fireworks
Press the button on the main platform to activate the fireworks! There might be minor lag. I suggest going up to the ladder and looking up after activating the fireworks. You can also do this multiple times.

That?s basically it! Have fun!
Spread love.

title: Minecraft Blackwell Academy
briefDescription: Blackwell Academy is the school attended by Max, the main character of the game Life is Strange. I have fully rebuilt it in Minecraft. It ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Blackwell Academy is the school attended by Max, the main character of the game Life is Strange. I have fully rebuilt it in Minecraft. It has a completely built interior, and an exterior of course. Built in a creative world, using the CITY RESOURCE PACK.

With the City Resource Pack, I made Blackwell Academy. The infamous school from one of my favorite games, Life is Strange. It is not just the playable areas that I have built, but the entire school, both inside and out. Take a look!
To see more of the map, including a tour and some talk about building the map, watch this video

title: Frostbourne Plains Castle: Kingdom Update
briefDescription: An old medieval castle made for the early versions of Pocket Edition, rebuilt, remodeled, and redecorated to be practical in a new Bedrock Edition 1.16 world. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
An old medieval castle made for the early versions of Pocket Edition, rebuilt, remodeled, and redecorated to be practical in a new Bedrock Edition 1.16 world.
As I continued to expand this world, I decided to officially declare this a kingdom, starting by colonizing the nearby villages
So it?s a small castle originally built by an unknown player from a Minecraft builder app, but I redecorated it with the new Minecraft features to make it functional even without the use of redstone for the current versions of Minecraft. I also decorated it with the Frostbourne banner from Rainimator?s Fractures series to honor him and to make this world a human settlement.

It?s actually a practical fortress capable of fending off mobs, but isn?t good against enemy players. Since it?s populated by many villagers, a raid can occur, although the castle gives you a massive advantage as raiders are only used to raiding small villages, and they lack proper siege equipment against castles. I also placed a sugar cane farm and a nether portal just outside the castle.
There?s a nearby colonized village just in front of the castle, so the villagers in there will serve as good peasants as long as they?re treated properly.
Inside the Nether, there is a Crimson Forest and a hole with ladders that will take you to the bedrock level where you can mine ancient debris.

Kingdom update: I decided to rename this world to Frostbourne Kingdom, and I made it a kingdom starting by colonizing the neighbouring Savannah village inorder to expand the size of the kingdom, a similar tactic used by the Villager Kingdom from Mr.FudgeMonkeyz?s Annoying Villagers. I?ll also colonize other unexplored villages if possible, or you can just do it yourself.
You must first cross an acacia bridge to visit the place.
The village is relatively small village populated mostly by animals.

In the original village, I added a Golem Totem, a magical totem with the power to summon an Iron Golem, greatly upgrading the village?s defense system against mobs. Although the golems summoned by this are neutral towards players, and shouldn?t be messed with.
